The first issue of the TownCrier Interview Sessions went live this morning on the wiki! A weekly series of interviews, both in and out of character, with some of Elanthia's most notable names. This week's interviewee is Nuadjha kis'Anthri, who generously hosted the interview on the Falcon. Give it a read and tell us what you think!

https://goo.gl/Fcpybt
